GS24pmbh_1su:1: (Pas_1) KA_I,1.1-5 Ro_I,1-4 {2/10} atha iti ayam śabdaḥ adhikārārthaḥ prayujyate .

GS24pmbh_1su:48: vyākaraṇam. brāhmaṇena avaśyam śabdāḥ jñeyāḥ iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:53: (Pas_3) KA_I,1.14-2.2 Ro_I,8-14 {14/17} sthūlapr̥ṣatīm āgnivāruṇīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:55: (Pas_3) KA_I,1.14-2.2 Ro_I,8-14 {16/17} tām na avaiyākaraṇaḥ svarataḥ adhyavasyati .

GS24pmbh_1su:63: (Pas_4.1) KA_I,2.3-9 Ro_I,11-12 {4/8} te asurāḥ helayaḥ helayaḥ iti kurvantaḥ parā babhūvuḥ .

GS24pmbh_1su:83: (Pas_4.4) KA_I,2.18-3.5 Ro_I,13-15 {6/27} yaḥ hi śabdān jānāti apaśabdān api asau jānāti
GS24pmbh_1su:84: (Pas_4.4) KA_I,2.18-3.5 Ro_I,13-15 {7/27} yathā eva hi śabdajñāne dharmaḥ evam apaśabdajñāne api adharmaḥ .

GS24pmbh_1su:89: (Pas_4.4) KA_I,2.18-3.5 Ro_I,13-15 {11/27} tat yathā gauḥ iti asya śabdasya gāvī goṇī gotā gopotalikā iti evamādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ .

GS24pmbh_1su:98: (Pas_4.4) KA_I,2.18-3.5 Ro_I,13-15 {19/27} kva punaḥ idam paṭhitam .

GS24pmbh_1su:188: (Pas_4.12) KA_I,4.22-25 Ro_I,21 {3/6} tat hi pratiṣṭhitatamam bhavati

GS24pmbh_1su:207: (Pas_5) KA_I,5.5-11 Ro_I,22-23 {1/8} kim punaḥ idam vyākaranam eva adhijigāṃsamānebhyaḥ prayojanam anvākhyāyate na punaḥ anyat api kim cit .
GS24pmbh_1su:208: (Pas_5) KA_I,5.5-11 Ro_I,22-23 {2/8} om iti uktvā vr̥ttāntaśaḥ śam iti evamādīn śabdān paṭhanti .
GS24pmbh_1su:211: (Pas_5) KA_I,5.5-11 Ro_I,22-23 {4/8} tebhyaḥ tatra sthānakaraṇānupradānajñebhyaḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ upadiśyante .
GS24pmbh_1su:212: (Pas_5) KA_I,5.5-11 Ro_I,22-23 {5/8} tat adyatve na tathā .
GS24pmbh_1su:213: (Pas_5) KA_I,5.5-11 Ro_I,22-23 {6/8} vedam adhītya tvaritāḥ vaktāraḥ bhavanti : vedāt naḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ siddhāḥ lokāt ca laukikāḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:215: (Pas_5) KA_I,5.5-11 Ro_I,22-23 {8/8} tebhyaḥ vipratipannabuddhibhyaḥ adhyetr̥bhyaḥ ācāryaḥ idam śāstram anvācaṣṭe : imāni prayojanāni adhyeyam
GS24pmbh_1su:227: (Pas_6) KA_I,5.11-22 Ro_I,23-24 {9/20} pañca pañcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ iti ukte gamyate etat : ataḥ anye abhakṣyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:230: grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ukte gamyate etat : āraṇyaḥ bhakṣyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:231: (Pas_6) KA_I,5.11-22 Ro_I,23-24 {12/20} evam iha api : yadi tāvat śabdopadeśaḥ kriyate gauḥ iti etasmin upadiṣṭe gamyate etat : gāvyādayaḥ apaśabdāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:233: gāvyādiṣu upadiṣṭeṣu gamyate etat : gauḥ iti eṣaḥ śabdaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:234: (Pas_6) KA_I,5.11-22 Ro_I,23-24 {14/20} kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ .

GS24pmbh_1su:244: (Pas_7) KA_I,5.23-6.7 Ro_I,24-25 {1/21} atha etasmin śabdopadeśe sati kim śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ : gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ

GS24pmbh_1su:250: indrāya divyam varṣasahasram pratipadoktānām śabdānām śabdapārāyaṇam provāca na antam jagāma
GS24pmbh_1su:251: (Pas_7) KA_I,5.23-6.7 Ro_I,24-25 {5/21} br̥haspatiḥ ca pravaktā indraḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:252: ca adhyetā divyam varṣasahasram adhyayanakālaḥ na ca antam jagāma .

GS24pmbh_1su:1113: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {69/115} ayam khalu api bhūyaḥ anukaraṇaśabdaḥ aparihāryaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1115: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {71/115} madhu l̥kāram adhīte iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1120: ca latvam asiddham tasya asiddhatvāt r̥kāre eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1127: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {79/115} prakr̥tivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1129: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {81/115} dviḥ pacantu iti āha .
GS24pmbh_1su:1130: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {82/115} tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:1132: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {84/115} īdūdet dvivacanam pragr̥hyam iti pragr̥hyasañjñā yathā syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:1134: anukaraṇam bhavati iti ucyate apaśabdaḥ eva asau bhavati kumārīl̥takaḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbh_1su:1135: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {86/115} brahmaṇī l̥takaḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbh_1su:1141: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {90/115} na ca anupadiṣṭā prakr̥tiḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:1143: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {91/115} ekadeśavikr̥tam ananyavat bhavati iti plutyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1145: ananyavat bhavati iti ucyate rājñaḥ ka ca rājakīyam allopaḥ anaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1146: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {93/115} ekadeśavikr̥tam ananyavat ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbh_1su:1148: ucyate kl̥ptaśikha iti plutaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1149: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {95/115} na hi atra r̥kāraḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:1153: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {98/115} r̥kāraḥ api atra ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1156: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {101/115} kr̥pa uḥ raḥ laḥ kr̥po ro laḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1157: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {102/115} atha vā punaḥ astu aviśeṣeṇa .
GS24pmbh_1su:1159: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {104/115} rājñaḥ ka ca rājakīyam allopaḥ anaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1161: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {106/115} śvādīnām prasāraṇe nakārāntagrahaṇam anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1162: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {107/115} tat prakr̥tam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:1165: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {109/115} iha tarhi kl̥ptaśikha iti
GS24pmbh_1su:1171: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 {112/115} yadi aravataḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbh_1su:1180: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {2/80} imāni sandhyakṣarāṇi taparāṇi vā upadiśyeran
GS24pmbh_1su:1185: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {6/80} kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1186: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {7/80} sandhyakṣareṣu taparopadeśaḥ cet taparoccāraṇam
GS24pmbh_1su:1187: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {8/80} sandhyakṣareṣu taparopadeśaḥ cet taparoccāraṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:1189: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {10/80} plutyādiṣu ajāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbh_1su:1191: atra anaci ca iti acaḥ uttarasya yaraḥ dve bhavataḥ iti dvirvacanam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1193: aitikayana udaṅ aupagava iti aci iti ṅamuṭ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1198: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {16/80} ūkalaḥ ac hrasvadīrghaplutaḥ iti plutasañjñā na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1202: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {19/80} yadi ataparāṇi ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbh_1su:1204: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {21/80} ecaḥ hrasvādeśaśāsaneṣu ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1205: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {22/80} nanu ca yasya api taparāṇi tena api etat vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:1206: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {23/80} imau aicau samāhāravarṇau mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1207: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {24/80} tayoḥ hrasvādeśaśāsaneṣu kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau .
GS24pmbh_1su:1208: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {25/80} mā kadā cit avarṇam bhūt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1211: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {27/80} yadi pratyākhyānapakṣaḥ idam api pratyākhyāyate : siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1213: sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:1215: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {30/80} yadi hi tau syātām tau eva ayam upadiśet
GS24pmbh_1su:1216: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {31/80} nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham okāram ca adhīyate : sujāte
GS24pmbh_1su:1217: eśvasūnr̥te , adhvaryo odribhiḥ sutam , śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat
GS24pmbh_1su:1220: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {33/80} na eva hi loke na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1224: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {37/80} vr̥ddhiḥ eci dīrghaḥ iti
GS24pmbh_1su:1226: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {39/80} āntaryataḥ trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ mā bhūvan iti.
GS24pmbh_1su:1227: khaṭvā , indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ , khaṭvā , udakam khaṭvodakam , khaṭvā , īṣā khaṭveṣā , khaṭvā , ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā , khaṭvā , elakā khaṭvailakā , khaṭvā ,
GS24pmbh_1su:1228: odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ , khaṭvā , aitikāyanaḥ khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ , khaṭvā ,
GS24pmbh_1su:1237: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {45/80} dīrghaḥ ca sa bhavati yaḥ saḥ ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ iti evam nirdiṣṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1238: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {46/80} iha api tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1242: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {49/80} iha tāvat paśum iti ami ekaḥ iti iyatā siddham .
GS24pmbh_1su:1243: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {50/80} saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yathājātīyakaḥ pūrvaḥ tathājātīyakaḥ ubhayoḥ yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1244: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {51/80} viddham iti pūrvaḥ iti eva anuvartate .
GS24pmbh_1su:1246: jñāpayati na anena samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam halaḥ uttarasya samprasāraṇasya dīrghatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1247: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {53/80} pacanti iti ataḥ guṇe paraḥ iti iyatā siddham
GS24pmbh_1su:1248: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {54/80} saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat rūpagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yathājātīyakam parasya rūpam tathājātīyakam ubhayoḥ yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1250: mālarśyaḥ iti dīrghavacanāt akāraḥ na ānantaryāt ekākaukārau na .
GS24pmbh_1su:1256: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {60/80} yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1257: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {61/80} kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1259: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {63/80} vr̥ddhīḥ āt aic dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:1260: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {64/80} at eṅ guṇaḥ dīrghaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1265: trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninam trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1267: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {69/80} nanu ca bhoḥ taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1269: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {71/80} tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1270: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {72/80} yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ r̥̄doḥ ap iti iha eva syāt : yavaḥ stavaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1271: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {73/80} lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:1278: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {79/80} yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api
GS24pmbh_1su:1279: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 {80/80} atha mukhasukhārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api .
GS24pmbh_1su:1292: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {7/138} tatra samudāyasthasya avayavasya avayavagrahaṇena grahaṇam syāt vā na vā iti jāyate vicāraṇā .
GS24pmbh_1su:1293: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {8/138} kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1294: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {9/138} varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena cet sandhyakṣre samānākṣaravidhipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1295: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {10/138} varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena iti cet sandhyakṣare samānākṣarāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1302: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {15/138} dīrghe hrasvākṣarāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:1310: jñāpayati na dīrghe hrasvāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam dīrghāt che tukam śāsti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1311: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {21/138} na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbh_1su:1312: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {22/138} asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbh_1su:1321: mālābhiḥ , ataḥ bihsaḥ ais , iti aisbhāvaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1324: ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke iti akāralopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1325: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {30/138} nanu ca atra api taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt eva na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:1329: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {33/138} sarvasya lopaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1331: tapare parasya lope kr̥te pūrvasya kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:1332: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {35/138} paralopasya sthānivadbhāvāt asiddhatvāt ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:1333: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {36/138} evam tarhi ācāryapravr̥ttiḥ jñāpayati nākārasthasya akārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kakāram anubandham karoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1335: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {38/138} kitkaraṇe etat prayojanam kiti iti ākārlopaḥ yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1337: api akārlopaḥ syāt kitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:1339: kr̥te dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpe hi siddham rūpam syāt: godaḥ , kambaladaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1342: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {42/138} ataḥ kakāram anubandham karoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1343: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {43/138} na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbh_1su:1347: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {46/138} yat tarhi gāpoḥ ṭhak iti ananyārtham kakāram anubandham karoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1354: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {51/138} iha ca vācaḥ nimittam
GS24pmbh_1su:1355: , tasya nimittam saṃyogotpāttau iti dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ yat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1357: jñāpakam dīrghāt dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1359: parihāraḥ : na avyapavr̥ktasya avayave tadvidhiḥ yathā dravyeṣu .
GS24pmbh_1su:1361: avayavsya avayavāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati yathā dravyeṣu .
GS24pmbh_1su:1363: saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ bhavanti iti na saptadaśāratnimātram kāṣṭham agnau abhyādhīyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:1366: tat karma codyate asambhavaḥ ca agnau vedyām ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:1368: prādeśamātrīḥ aśvatthīḥ samidhaḥ abhyādadhīta iti na saptadaśaprādeśamātram kāṣṭham abhyādhīyate
GS24pmbh_1su:1370: ca etat karma codyate tulyaḥ ca asambhavaḥ agnau vedyām ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:1371: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {60/138} yathā tarhi tailam na vikretavyam , māṃsam na vikretavyam iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1372: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {61/138} vyapavr̥tkam ca na vikrīyate , avyapavr̥ktam ca gāvaḥ ca sarṣapāḥ ca vikriyante .
GS24pmbh_1su:1373: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {62/138} tathā lomanakham spr̥ṣṭvā śaucam kartavyam iti , vyapavr̥ktam spr̥ṣṭvā niyogataḥ kartavyam avyapavr̥kte kāmacāraḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:1374: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {63/138} yatra tarhi vyapavargaḥ asti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1386: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {70/138} agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu r̥kāragrahaṇam .
GS24pmbh_1su:1387: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {71/138} agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu r̥kārasya grahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:1389: r̥kāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : ānr̥dhatuḥ , ānr̥dhuḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1392: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {74/138} yasya api na gr̥hyante
GS24pmbh_1su:1395: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {76/138} tasmāt nuṭ bhavati iti eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:1396: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {77/138} yadi na kriyate āṭatuḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:1399: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {79/138} aśnoteḥ eva avarṇopadhasya na anyasya avarṇopadhasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1400: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {80/138} lādeśe ca r̥kāragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbh_1su:1402: r̥kārasya ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : kl̥ptaḥ , kl̥ptavān iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:1405: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {83/138} yasya api na gr̥hyante
GS24pmbh_1su:1407: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {84/138} r̥kāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:1414: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 {89/138} raśruteḥ laśrutiḥ bhavati iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:3101: tannimittagrahaṇasya prayojanāni : hataḥ , hathaḥ , upoyate , auyata ,

GS24pmbh_1su:3121: vikaraṇasya na prāpnoti : cinutaḥ , sunutaḥ , lunītaḥ , punītaḥ iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:3141: (P_1,1.5.2) KA_I,54.13-55.5 Ro_I,175-177 {19/42} kitkaraṇe etat prayojanam guṇaḥ katham na syāt iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:3175: (P_1,1.5.3) KA_I,55.6-18 Ro_I,177-180 {1/14} iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbh_1su:3179: guṇavr̥ddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca ete iglakṣaṇe .
GS24pmbh_1su:3185: sthānivadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanāt siddham . yat ayam yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ṅidādeśāḥ ṅitaḥ bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:3186: (P_1,1.5.3) KA_I,55.6-18 Ro_I,177-180 {7/14} yadi etat jñāpyate katham nityam ṅitaḥ itaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:3187: (P_1,1.5.3) KA_I,55.6-18 Ro_I,177-180 {8/14} ṅitaḥ yat kāryam tat bhavati ṅiti yat kāryam tat na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:3192: (P_1,1.5.3) KA_I,55.6-18 Ro_I,177-180 {13/14} aparyāptaḥ ca eva hi yāsuṭ samudāyasya ṅittve ṅitam ca enam karoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:3194: ṅitaḥ yat kāryam tat yathā syāt ṅiti yat kāryam tat mā bhūt iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:3208: (P_1,1.6) KA_I,55.20-56.16 Ro_I,180-182 {12/40} prajapatiḥ vai yat kim cana manasā adīdhet
GS24pmbh_1su:3218: (P_1,1.6) KA_I,55.20-56.16 Ro_I,180-182 {18/40} saḥ yathā eva kṅiti na iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam imam api bādhate .

GS24pmbh_1su:3226: (P_1,1.6) KA_I,55.20-56.16 Ro_I,180-182 {25/40} na ca aprāpte kṅiti na iti etasmin pratiṣedhe jusi guṇaḥ ārabhyate .

GS24pmbh_1su:3231: (P_1,1.6) KA_I,55.20-56.16 Ro_I,180-182 {30/40} iṭaḥ ca api grahaṇam śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbh_1su:3232: (P_1,1.6) KA_I,55.20-56.16 Ro_I,180-182 {31/40} katham akaṇiṣam araṇiṣam , kaṇitā śvaḥ , raṇitā śvaḥ iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:4510: (P_1,1.22) KA_I,79.12-80.2 Ro_I,255-256 {2/26} ghasañjñāyām nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ

GS24pmbh_1su:4561: gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya iti yasya eṣā sañjñā bhavati saḥ ānīyate na yaḥ gāḥ pālayati yaḥ vā kaṭe jātaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:4562: (P_1,1.23.1) KA_I,80.4-82.9 Ro_I,256-263 {18/91} yadi tarhi kr̥trimākr̥trimayoḥ kr̥trime sampratyayaḥ bhavati nadīpaurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇībhyaḥ iti atra api prasajyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:4564: (P_1,1.23.1) KA_I,80.4-82.9 Ro_I,256-263 {20/91} tadviśeṣebhyaḥ tarhi prāpnoti : gaṅgā yamunā iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:4570: (P_1,1.23.1) KA_I,80.4-82.9 Ro_I,256-263 {25/91} bahuvacananirdeśāt eva na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbh_1su:4572: akr̥tam bhavati kr̥trimākr̥trimayoḥ kr̥trime sampratyayaḥ iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ .

GS24pmbh_1su:4582: itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ akr̥trimatvāt yathā loke iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:4587: evaṃsaṅjñakena bhavati prakr̥tam vā tatra bhavati idam evaṃsaṅjñakena kartavyam iti. ātaḥ ca arthāt prakaraṇāt vā .
GS24pmbh_1su:4589: grāmyam pāṃsurapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:4603: kr̥trimasya grahaṇam kartari karmavyatihāre iti akr̥trimasya .

GS24pmbh_1su:6079: (P_1,1.45) KA_I,111.2-112.17 Ro_I,342-346 {8/49} saḥ eva hi tāvat ik durlabhaḥ yasya sañjñā kriyate .

GS24pmbh_1su:6221: yat paraḥ ca syāt antaḥ ca .

GS24pmbh_1su:7257: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {12/32} guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā .
GS24pmbh_1su:7259: asmin guruputre vartitavyam iti gurau yat kāryam tat guruputre atidiśyate
GS24pmbh_1su:7260: , evam iha api sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7264: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {16/32} tat yathā loke yaḥ yasya prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau tatkāryāṇi .
GS24pmbh_1su:7265: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {17/32} tat yathā upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ yājyakulāni gatvā agrāsanādīni labhate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7267: loke eṣaḥ dr̥ṣṭāntaḥ dr̥ṣṭāntasya api tu puruṣārambhaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7268: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {19/32} asti ca iha kaḥ cit puruṣārambhaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:7272: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {23/32} hanteḥ ātmanepadam ucyamānam hanteḥ eva syāt vadheḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:7273: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {24/32} evam tarhi ācāryapravr̥ttiḥ jñāpayati sthānivat ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam yuṣmadasmadoḥ anādeśe iti ādeśapratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7276: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {26/32} yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktau kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ādeśe syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:7279: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {28/32} ataḥ ādeśe pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7280: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {29/32} idam tarhi prayojanam : analvidhau iti pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi iti , iha mā bhūt : dyauḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:7282: (P_1,1.56.2) KA_I,133.17-134.9 Ro_I,401-402 {30/32} etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7284: jñāpayati alvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na bhavati iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyap ti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7287: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {1/36} ārabhyamāṇe api etasmin yoge alvidhau pratiṣedhe aviśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ tasya adarśanāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:7288: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {2/36} alvidhau pratiṣedhe asati api viśeṣaṇe samāśrīyamaṇe asati tasmin viśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ vidheḥ :
GS24pmbh_1su:7295: eva ayam yatnaḥ kriyate : anyasya kāryam ucyamānam anyasya yathā syāt iti
GS24pmbh_1su:7296: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {7/36} satyam evamarthaḥ na tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:7298: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {9/36} sāmānyātideśe viśeṣānatideśaḥ . sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne viśeṣaḥ na atidiṣṭaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7300: brahmaṇavat asmin kṣatriye vartitavyam iti sāmānyam yat brāhmaṇakāryam tat kṣatriye atidiśyate
GS24pmbh_1su:7301: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {11/36} yat viśiṣṭam māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7303: sāmānyam yat pratyayakāryam tat atidiśyate yat viśiṣṭam valādeḥ iti na tat atidiśyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7305: iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sicaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7306: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {14/36} analvidhau iti punaḥ ucyamāne iha api pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati : pradīvya prasīvya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7313: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {18/36} yadi tarhi sāmānyam api atidiśyate viśeṣaḥ ca sati āśraye vidhiḥ iṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:7316: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {20/36} kim ataḥ yat sati bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7317: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {21/36} pratiṣedhaḥ tu prāpnoti alvidhitvāt
GS24pmbh_1su:7322: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {26/36} tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7328: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {31/36} astu atra ānudeśikasya valāditvasya pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:7329: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {32/36} svāśrayam atra valāditvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbh_1su:7334: (P_1,1.56.3) KA_I,134.10-135.8 Ro_I,403-406 {36/36} tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7336: ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe ādeśini ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:7351: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 {11/37} astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe ādeśini ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:7358: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 {15/37} sthānivadbhāvāt supsañjñā svāśrayam ca yañāditvam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7361: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 {18/37} tiṅ : aruditām aruditam arudita .
GS24pmbh_1su:7362: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 {19/37} sthānivadbhāvāt sārvadhātukasañjñā svāśrayam ca valāditvam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7367: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 {23/37} sthānivadbhāvāt pratyayasañjñā svāśrayam ca ajāditvam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7371: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 {26/37} ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe pratiṣedhaḥ iti jyāyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:7374: viśiṣṭam sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśati guruvat guruputre iti yathā .
GS24pmbh_1su:7375: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 {29/37} tat yathā : guruvat guruputre vartitavyam anyatra ucchiṣṭabhojanāt pādopasaṅgrahaṇāc ca iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7377: api guruḥ bhavati tat api kartavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7387: (P_1,1.56.4) KA_I,135.9-136.4 Ro_I,406-408 {37/37} anyaḥ ayam akaśabdaḥ kit auṇādikaḥ rucakaḥ iti yathā .
GS24pmbh_1su:7394: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {5/45} tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:7398: ananyavat bhavati iti tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7399: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {8/45} tat yatha : śvā karṇe vā pucche vā chinne śvā eva bhavati na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7400: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {9/45} anityatvavijñānam tu tasmāt upasaṅkhyanam
GS24pmbh_1su:7403: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {12/45} nityeṣu nāma śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:7405: vikr̥taḥ ca etat nityeṣu na upapadyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7407: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {15/45} bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti : ekadeśavikr̥teṣu upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7415: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {21/45} ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti ucyate , na ca ime ādeśāḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:7418: rūpam pacati iti anyat pacatu iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7425: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {28/45} ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet na anāśritatvāt
GS24pmbh_1su:7426: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {29/45} ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti cet tat na
GS24pmbh_1su:7429: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {32/45} yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:7431: samudāye āśrīyamāṇe avayavaḥ na āśrīyate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7432: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {34/45} abhyantaraḥ hi samudāyasya avayavaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:7436: alvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . āśrayaḥ iti cet alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7437: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {37/45} tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7439: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {39/45} na evam sati kaḥ cit api analvidhiḥ syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:7442: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {41/45} tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ alvidhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7445: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {43/45} yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7446: (P_1,1.56.5) KA_I,136.5-137.2 Ro_I,408-411 {44/45} yatra nāntarīyakaḥ al āśrīyate na asau alvidhiḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:7448: ādeśagrahaṇasya prayojanam : ādeśamātram sthānivat yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7450: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {2/40} sthānī ādeśaḥ iti etat nityeṣu śabdeṣu na upapadyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7453: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {5/40} sthānī hi nām yaḥ bhūtvā na bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7454: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {6/40} ādeśaḥ hi nāma yaḥ abhūtvā bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7455: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {7/40} etat ca nityeṣu śabdeṣu na upapadyate yat sataḥ nāma vināśaḥ syāt asataḥ vā prādurbhāvaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7460: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {11/40} yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kr̥tānteṣu abhūtapūrve api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7462: upādhyāyasya sthāne śiṣyaḥ iti ucyate na ca tatra upādhyāyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7463: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {13/40} vede api : somasya sthāne pūtīkatr̥ṇāni abhiṣuṇuyāt iti ucyate na ca tatra somaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7465: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {15/40} atha vā kāryavipariṇāmāt siddham etat
GS24pmbh_1su:7466: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {16/40} kim idam kāryavipariṇāmāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7469: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {19/40} nanu ca kāryāvipariṇāmāt iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbh_1su:7470: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {20/40} santi ca eva hi auttarpadikāni hrasvatvāni
GS24pmbh_1su:7474: sampratyayaḥ kāryasya sampratyayasya vipariṇāmaḥ kāryavipariṇāmaḥ kāryavipariṇāmāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7475: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {23/40} parihārantaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam
GS24pmbh_1su:7478: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {25/40} yadi bhūtapūrve sthānaśabdaḥ vartate
GS24pmbh_1su:7483: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {29/40} tat yathā kaḥ cit kasmai cit upadiśati prācīnam grāmāt āmrāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7484: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {30/40} tasya sarvatra āmrabuddhiḥ prasaktā
GS24pmbh_1su:7485: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {31/40} tataḥ paścāt aha ye kṣīriṇaḥ avarohavantaḥ pr̥thuparṇāḥ te nyagrodhāḥ iti. saḥ tatra āmrabuddhyāḥ nyagrodhabuddhim pratipadyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7487: buddhyā āmrān ca apakr̥ṣyamāṇān nyagrodhān ca ādhīyamānān .
GS24pmbh_1su:7488: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {33/40} nityāḥ eva ca svasmin viṣaye āmrāḥ nityāḥ ca nyagrodhāḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:7491: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {35/40} evam iha api astiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:7492: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {36/40} tasya sarvatra astibuddhiḥ prasaktā
GS24pmbh_1su:7493: (P_1,1.56.6) KA_I,137.3-26 Ro_I,411-412 {37/40} saḥ asteḥ bhūḥ iti astibuddhyāḥ bhavatibuddhim pratipadyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:7495: buddhyā astim ca apakr̥ṣyamāṇam bhavatim ca ādhīyamānam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7504: anupasarge kaḥ iti ke api aṇi kr̥tam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7509: (P_1,1.56.7) KA_I,138.1-10 Ro_I,413-414 {8/19} viṣayeṇa tu nānāliṅgakaraṇāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7511: (P_1,1.56.7) KA_I,138.1-10 Ro_I,413-414 {10/19} siddham tu ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya sthānivadvacanāt
GS24pmbh_1su:7514: (P_1,1.56.7) KA_I,138.1-10 Ro_I,413-414 {13/19} ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7515: (P_1,1.56.7) KA_I,138.1-10 Ro_I,413-414 {14/19} tat tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbh_1su:7520: (P_1,1.56.7) KA_I,138.1-10 Ro_I,413-414 {19/19} atha vā ācāryapravr̥ttiḥ jñāpayati na apavāde utsargakr̥tam bhavati iti yat ayam śyanādīnām kān cit śitaḥ karoti : śyan , śnam , śnā , śaḥ , śnuḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7521: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {1/137} tasya doṣaḥ tayādeśe ubhayapratiṣedhaḥ . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ : tayādeśe ubhayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {2/137} tayapaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt jasi vibhāṣā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7524: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {5/137} yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7536: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {14/137} yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7538: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {16/137} evam api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7539: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {17/137} sadr̥śasya api asanniviṣṭasya na bhaviṣyati pratyāhāreṇa grahaṇam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7541: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {19/137} jātyakhyāyām vacanātideśe sthānivadbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:7542: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {20/137} vrīhibhyaḥ āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti it guṇaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7546: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {23/137} ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ ādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:7550: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {26/137} ṅyābgrahaṇena grahaṇāt sulopaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:7561: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {33/137} atha idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāve dīrghatve kr̥te pit ca asau bhūtapūrvaḥ iti kr̥tvā yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:7564: sati api sthānivadbhāve etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam iha upasthātum .
GS24pmbh_1su:7566: (P_1,1.56.8) KA_I,138.11-141.22 Ro_I,414-421 {37/137} na hi idānīm kva cit api sthānivadbhāvaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:7570: {40/137} praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam : ṅī* ī* īkārāntāt ā* āp ākārāntāt iti

GS24pmbh_1su:9376: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {32/62} tathā lasārvadhātuke iti eṣā saptamī tāsyādibhyaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbh_1su:9377: prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9379: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {34/62} ubhayoḥ kāryam tatra prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:9381: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {36/62} yat tāvat ucyate : prakalpakam iti cet niyamābhāvaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9383: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {38/62} saptamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī prakalpyate pañcamīnirdiṣṭe parasya .
GS24pmbh_1su:9384: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {39/62} yāvatā saptamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī prakalpyate evam pañcamīnirdiṣṭe parasya .
GS24pmbh_1su:9385: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {40/62} na utsahate saptamīnirdiṣṭe parasya kāryam bhavitum na api pañcamīnirdiṣṭe pūrvasya .
GS24pmbh_1su:9387: : pratyayavidhau khalu api pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ syuḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9390: guptijkibhyaḥ san iti eṣā pañcamī san iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9393: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {45/62} tatra āntaryataḥ sanaḥ san eva bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9397: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {48/62} upadeśe iti itsañjñā ucyate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9400: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {50/62} tatra khalu kr̥tāyām itsañjñāyām lope ca kr̥te ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:9405: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {53/62} yadā ca utpannaḥ san tadā kr̥tasāmarthyā pañcamī iti kr̥tvā prakl̥ptiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:9409: prakr̥tau ṣaṣṭhī ikaḥ iti vikr̥tau prathamā yaṇ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9411: sautrī ṣaṣṭhī na asti tatra prakl̥ptyā bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:9413: tāvat ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti yatra nāma sautrī ṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbh_1su:9415: aci iti eṣā saptamī yaṇ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti astu .
GS24pmbh_1su:9418: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 {60/62} tatra āntaryataḥ yaṇaḥ yaṇ eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:9420: : saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakl̥ptiḥ tatra ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9421: {62/62} ācāryapravr̥ttiḥ jñāpayati na ubhe yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:9422: iti yat ayam ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ iti pūrvagrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9424: na svam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā bhavati iti eva rūpam śabasya sañjñā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:9425: (P_1,1.68.1) KA_I,175.20-23 Ro_I,519-520 {2/7} na hi anyat svam śabdasya asti anyat ataḥ rūpāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:9426: (P_1,1.68.1) KA_I,175.20-23 Ro_I,519-520 {3/7} evam tarhi siddhe sati yat rūpagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti anyat rūpāt svam śabdasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9431: (P_1,1.68.1) KA_I,175.20-23 Ro_I,519-520 {7/7} arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati .

GS24pmbh_1su:9436: aśāna iti arthaḥ ānīyate arthaḥ ca bhujyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:9438: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {5/42} iha vyākaraṇe arthe kāryasya asambhavaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:9439: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {6/42} agneḥ ḍak iti : na śakyate aṅgārebhyaḥ paraḥ ḍhak kartum .
GS24pmbh_1su:9440: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {7/42} śabdena arthagateḥ arthasya asambhavāt yāvantaḥ tadvācinaḥ śabdāḥ tāvadbhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9444: yatnam na sidhyati iti tadvācinaḥ sañjñāpratiṣedhārtham svaṃrūpavacanam .
GS24pmbh_1su:9446: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {11/42} na vā śabdapūrvakaḥ hi arthe sampratyayaḥ tasmāt arthanivr̥ttiḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:9450: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {14/42} śabdapūrvakaḥ hi arthe sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:9451: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {15/42} śabdapūrvakaḥ hi arthasya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:9452: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {16/42} ātaḥ ca śabdapūrvakaḥ : yaḥ api hi asau āhūyate nāmnā nāma yadā anena na upalabdham bhavati tada pr̥cchati kim bhavān āha iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9453: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {17/42} śabdapūrvakaḥ ca arthasya sampratyayaḥ iha ca vyākaraṇe śabde kāryasya sambhavaḥ arthe

GS24pmbh_1su:9459: dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:9465: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {26/42} nanu ca vacanaprāmāṇyāt sañjñinām sampratyayaḥ syāt svarūpagrahaṇāt ca sañjñāyāḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:9466: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {27/42} etat api na asti prayojanam .

GS24pmbh_1su:9469: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {29/42} itarathā hi vacanaprāmāṇyāt nakārāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ sampratyayaḥ syāt svarūpagrahaṇāt

GS24pmbh_1su:9483: (P_1,1.68.2) KA_I,175.24-176.24 Ro_I,520-523 {39/42} mantrādyartham iti cet na .

GS24pmbh_1su:9487: yajuṣi iti yat ucyate tat mantraśabde r̥kśabde ca yajuḥśabde ca tasya kāryasya sambhavaḥ na asti iti kr̥tvā mantrādisahacaritaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ tasya gatiḥ bhaviṣyati sāhacaryāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:9496: (P_1,1.68.3) KA_I,176.25-177.16 Ro_I,523-525 {7/29} pit paryāyavacanasya ca svādyartham
GS24pmbh_1su:9499: paryāyavacanasya tadviśeṣāṇām ca grahaṇam bhavati svasya ca rūpasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9503: svapoṣam puṣyati raipoṣam , vidyāpoṣam , gopoṣam aśvapoṣam .
GS24pmbh_1su:9504: (P_1,1.68.3) KA_I,176.25-177.16 Ro_I,523-525 {13/29} jit paryāyavacanasya eva rājādyartham

GS24pmbh_1su:9509: (P_1,1.68.3) KA_I,176.25-177.16 Ro_I,523-525 {18/29} sabhā rājāmanuṣyapūrvā : inasabham īśvarasabham .
GS24pmbh_1su:9512: (P_1,1.68.3) KA_I,176.25-177.16 Ro_I,523-525 {20/29} tadviśeṣāṇām ca na bhavati : puṣyamitrasabhā candraguptasabhā .
GS24pmbh_1su:9517: tasya ca grahaṇam bhavati tadviśeṣāṇām ca iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9524: (P_1,1.68.3) KA_I,176.25-177.16 Ro_I,523-525 {28/29} paryāyavacanānām na bhavati : ajihmān hanti iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:9528: (P_1,1.69.1) KA_I,177.18-178.7 Ro_I,525-527 {3/30} atyalpam idam ucyate : apratyayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:9541: jñāpayati na ṭitaḥ savarṇānām grahaṇam bhavati iti yat ayam grahaḥ aliṭi dīrghatvam śāsti

GS24pmbh_1su:10258: yadi atra niyogataḥ ātideśikena ṅittvena aupadeśikam kittvam bādhyeta .

GS24pmbh_1su:10263: (P_1,2.4.1) KA_I,193.15-22 Ro_II,10-11 {2/13} apit iti iyati ucyamāne ārdhadhātukasya api apitaḥ ṅittvam prasajyeta : kartā hartā .
GS24pmbh_1su:10266: jñāpayati na anena ārdhadhātukasya ṅittvam bhavati iti yat ayam ārdhadhātukīyān kān cit ṅitaḥ karoti : caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10276: tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam iti caṅaṅau luṅvikaraṇānam jñāpakau syātām najiṅ vartamānakālānām ṅvanip bhūtakālānām athaṅśabdaḥ auṇādikānām naṅśabdaḥ ghañarthānām .
GS24pmbh_1su:10279: paryudāsaḥ : yat anyat pitaḥ , āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ : pit na iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10281: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {3/19} apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśapratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10282: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {4/19} apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : cyavante plavante .
GS24pmbh_1su:10285: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {7/19} pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ apitaḥ ādivat syāt
GS24pmbh_1su:10286: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {8/19} asti anyat pitaḥ iti
GS24pmbh_1su:10288: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {9/19} astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ : pit na iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10289: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {10/19} na pit ṅit iti cet uttamaikādeśapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:10290: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {11/19} pit na iti cet uttamaikādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti : tudāni likhāni .
GS24pmbh_1su:10293: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {14/19} pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ pitaḥ ādivat syāt
GS24pmbh_1su:10294: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {15/19} tatra pit na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:10301: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 {19/19} ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbh_1su:10302: (P_1,2.5) KA_I,194.9-16 Ro_II,12-13 {1/14} r̥dupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbh_1su:10303: (P_1,2.5) KA_I,194.9-16 Ro_II,12-13 {2/14} r̥dupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena : vavr̥te vavr̥dhe .
GS24pmbh_1su:10306: (P_1,2.5) KA_I,194.9-16 Ro_II,12-13 {5/14} na vā ksasya anavakāśatvāt apavādaḥ guṇasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10308: (P_1,2.5) KA_I,194.9-16 Ro_II,12-13 {7/14} yuktam tatra yat anavakāśam kitkaraṇam guṇam bādhate .
GS24pmbh_1su:10309: (P_1,2.5) KA_I,194.9-16 Ro_II,12-13 {8/14} iha punaḥ ubhayam sāvakāśam
GS24pmbh_1su:10322: (P_1,2.6) KA_I,194.18-195.2 Ro_II,14 {2/13} indheḥ samyogārtham vacanam bhavateḥ pidartham
GS24pmbh_1su:10323: (P_1,2.6) KA_I,194.18-195.2 Ro_II,14 {3/13} ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbh_1su:10325: (P_1,2.6) KA_I,194.18-195.2 Ro_II,14 {5/13} indheḥ chandoviṣayatvāt bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt tābhyām kidvacanānarthakyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:10327: (P_1,2.6) KA_I,194.18-195.2 Ro_II,14 {7/13} na hi antareṇa chandaḥ indheḥ anantaraḥ liṭ labhyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10330: (P_1,2.6) KA_I,194.18-195.2 Ro_II,14 {10/13} bhavateḥ api nityaḥ vuk .
GS24pmbh_1su:10331: (P_1,2.6) KA_I,194.18-195.2 Ro_II,14 {11/13} kr̥te api prāpnoti akr̥te
GS24pmbh_1su:10334: (P_1,2.6) KA_I,194.18-195.2 Ro_II,14 {13/13} tābhyām indhibhavitibhyām kidvacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbh_1su:10335: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {1/16} kimartham mr̥ḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate
GS24pmbh_1su:10336: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {2/16} kit eva hi ktvā .
GS24pmbh_1su:10337: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {3/16} na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbh_1su:10339: parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate na arthaḥ na ktvā seṭ iti anena kittvapratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbh_1su:10341: mr̥ḍādibhyaḥ eva parasya ktvaḥ kittvam bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10342: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {6/16} yadi niyamaḥ kriyate iha api tarhi niyamān na prāpnoti : lūtvā pūtvā .
GS24pmbh_1su:10343: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {7/16} atra api akittvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10351: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {13/16} evam api asti atra kaḥ cit
GS24pmbh_1su:10353: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {14/16} saḥ aniṭām niyāmakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10354: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {15/16} astu tāvat ye seṭaḥ teṣām grahaṇam niyamār̥tham
GS24pmbh_1su:10355: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 {16/16} yaḥ idānīm vibhāṣiteṭ tasya grahaṇam vidhyartham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10360: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {2/56} ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10362: guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti : cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10366: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {6/56} dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbh_1su:10368: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {8/56} kr̥te khalu dīrghatve guṇaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:10374: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {13/56} hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10375: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {14/56} bhavet hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10379: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {17/56} nanu ca dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10383: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {20/56} na hi bhuktavān punaḥ bhuṅkte na ca kr̥taśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10387: bhuṅkte kr̥taśmaśruḥ ca punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10390: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {24/56} sāmarthyāt tatra punaḥ pravr̥ttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt śilpiviśeṣāt vā .
GS24pmbh_1su:10391: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {25/56} dīrghāṇām punaḥ dīrghatvavacane na kim cit prayojanam asti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10392: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {26/56} akr̥takāri khalu api śāstram agnivat
GS24pmbh_1su:10393: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {27/56} tat yathā agniḥ yad adagdham tat dahati
GS24pmbh_1su:10394: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {28/56} dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacane etat prayojanam guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10395: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {29/56} kr̥takāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat
GS24pmbh_1su:10397: yāvat ūnam pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10399: dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na bhavati evam r̥̄dittvam api na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbh_1su:10406: akr̥te dīrghe r̥̄dittvam syāt dīrghāṇām tu khalu akr̥te api dīrghatve r̥̄dittvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:10411: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {38/56} yadā dīrghatvena guṇaḥ bādhitaḥ tataḥ uttarakālam r̥̄dittvam bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10418: yat sati kittve ṇilopaḥ syāt asati na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10419: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {43/56} eṣaḥ abhisambandhaḥ yat sati kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate .
GS24pmbh_1su:10421: anavakāśam dīrghatvam yathā eva guṇam bādhate evam ṇilopam api bādheta .
GS24pmbh_1su:10422: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {45/56} tatra ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ : kāraṇā hāraṇā .
GS24pmbh_1su:10423: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {46/56} dīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ : cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati
GS24pmbh_1su:10432: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {53/56} mīnātiminotyoḥ dīrghatve kr̥te mīgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10433: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {54/56} yathā eva tarhi asati kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate evam guṇaḥ api bādheta .
GS24pmbh_1su:10435: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 {56/56} ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt dīrghārambhāt kr̥te bhavet |
GS24pmbh_1su:10436: anarthakam tu hrasvārtham dīrghāṇām tu prasajyate || sāmarthyāt hi punaḥ bhāvyam r̥̄dittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam dīrghāṇām na akr̥te dīrghe ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam .
GS24pmbh_1su:10438: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {2/22} katham hi ikaḥ nāma hal antaḥ syāt anyasya anyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10442: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {5/22} yadi evam yiyakṣati atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10445: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {7/22} evam api dambheḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10448: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {10/22} nanu ca uktam ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbh_1su:10450: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {12/22} antaśabdaḥ ayam asti eva avayavavācī .
GS24pmbh_1su:10458: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {17/22} tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam
GS24pmbh_1su:10459: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {18/22} evam api dambheḥ na sidhyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10460: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {19/22} yaḥ atra iksamīpe hal na tasmāt uttaraḥ san .
GS24pmbh_1su:10461: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 {20/22} yasmāt uttaraḥ san na asau iksamīpe hal
GS24pmbh_1su:10467: : ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti āhosvit ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau
GS24pmbh_1su:10469: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {2/36} kim ca ataḥ. yadi vijñāyate ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti liṅ viśeṣitaḥ sic aviśeṣitaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10470: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {3/36} atha vijñāyate ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10473: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {5/36} astu tāvat ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10480: asti iti kr̥tvā ātmanepadapare sici kāryam vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:10481: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {11/36} atha vā punaḥ astu ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10482: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {12/36} nanu ca uktam sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10485: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {15/36} ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ liṅ na asti iti kr̥tvā ātmanepade liṅi kāryam vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:10486: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {16/36} na eva vā punaḥ arthaḥ liṅviśeṣaṇena ātmanepadagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbh_1su:10491: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {20/36} tat etat sijviśeṣaṇam ātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbh_1su:10492: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {21/36} atha sijviśeṣaṇe ātmanepadagrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbh_1su:10499: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {26/36} etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbh_1su:10510: guṇavr̥ddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vr̥ddhiḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10511: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {34/36} idam tarhi prayojanam : iha mā bhūt : adrākṣīt , asrākṣīt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10513: (P_1,2.11) KA_I,197.24-198.16 Ro_II,24-25 {36/36} akillakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10527: (P_1,2.17) KA_I,198.18-199.4 Ro_II,25-27 {9/13} kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantarārthe ārambhe hrasvaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ plutaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10532: (P_1,2.17) KA_I,198.18-199.4 Ro_II,25-27 {12/13} yadā ca saḥ viṣayaḥ bhavitavyam eva tadā plutena .
GS24pmbh_1su:10534: takārettvam dīrghaḥ mā bhūt r̥te api saḥ |
GS24pmbh_1su:10535: anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt plutaḥ ca viṣaye smr̥taḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:10538: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {2/68} na seṭ iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbh_1su:10543: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {6/68} niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbh_1su:10549: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {11/68} papiva papima : kṅiti iti ākāralopaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10553: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {14/68} idam tarhi : jagmiva jaghniva .
GS24pmbh_1su:10557: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {17/68} jñāpakāt parokṣāyām na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbh_1su:10560: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {20/68} yat ayam ikaḥ jhal iti jhalgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ aupadeśikasya kittvasya
GS24pmbh_1su:10564: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {22/68} jhalgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam : iha mā bhūt : śiśayiṣate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10566: ātideśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ syāt jhalgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10571: aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ na ātideśikasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:10586: supīvā : ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyamānaḥ asati ṅīpi na bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10587: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {37/68} atha vā astu atra ittvam .
GS24pmbh_1su:10592: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {41/68} vasvartham tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbh_1su:10602: , jaghnivān : kṅiti iti upadhālopaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:10604: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {49/68} astu atra aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10609: kvasuḥ liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10610: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {53/68} tatra sārvadhātukam apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅiti upadhālopaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10614: : iha mā bhūt : nigr̥hītiḥ , upasannihitiḥ , nikucitiḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10615: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {57/68} tat tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:10618: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {60/68} upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate : na seṭ niṣṭhā śīṅsvidimidikṣvididhr̥ṣaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:10622: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {64/68} pūṅaḥ niṣṭhā seṭ na kit bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10624: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 {66/68} ktvā ca seṭ na kit bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:10628: jñāpakāt na parokṣāyām sani jhalgrahaṇam viduḥ || ittvam kitsanniyogena reṇa tulyam sudhīvani
GS24pmbh_1su:10629: vasvartham kidatīdeśāt nigr̥hītiḥ ktvā ca vigrahāt ||

GS24pmbh_1su:10736: ādau vā madhye vā syāt plutasañjñā eva asya na syāt kutaḥ pratkr̥tibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:10738: mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ api ghyantam pūrvam nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ bhaviṣyati iti

GS24pmbh_1su:11315: (P_1,2.43.1) KA_I,214.13-22 Ro_II,63-64 {1/11} prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:11316: .prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:11317: (P_1,2.43.1) KA_I,214.13-22 Ro_II,63-64 {2/11} na hi kaṣṭādīnām samāse prathamām paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:11318: (P_1,2.43.1) KA_I,214.13-22 Ro_II,63-64 {3/11} siddham tu samāsavidhāne vacanāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:11321: (P_1,2.43.1) KA_I,214.13-22 Ro_II,63-64 {6/11} samāsavidhāne prathamānirdiṣṭam upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:11327: (P_1,2.43.1) KA_I,214.13-22 Ro_II,63-64 {11/11} tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhavati. samāsārtham śāstram samāsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11328: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {1/31} yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ tataḥ anyatra api upasarjanasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11329: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {2/31} yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ kriyate tataḥ anyatra api tasya upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti : rajñaḥ kumārīm rājakumārīm śritaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11333: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {5/31} siddham tu yasya vidhau tam prati iti vacanāt
GS24pmbh_1su:11337: prathamānirdiṣṭam tam prati tat upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:11342: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {12/31} sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11345: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {15/31} tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:11347: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {17/31} pradhānam upasarjanam iti ca sambandhiśabdau etau .
GS24pmbh_1su:11349: gantavyam : yam prati yat apradhānam tam prati tat upasarjanasñjñam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11351: ṣaṣṭhyante kasmāt tatra pradhānasya upasarjanasañjñā na bhavati : rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11354: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {22/31} ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11355: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {23/31} evam na ca idam akr̥tam
GS24pmbh_1su:11356: bhavet upsarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kr̥tvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbh_1su:11357: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {24/31} yadi api tāvat etat upasarjanakāryam parihr̥tam idam aparam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11359: (P_1,2.43.2) KA_I,215.1-21 Ro_II,64-67 {26/31} gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11366: (P_1,2.44.1) KA_I,215 23-216.5 Ro_II,67-68 {1/15} dvitīyādīnām api anena upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11368: (P_1,2.44.1) KA_I,215 23-216.5 Ro_II,67-68 {3/15} tatra apūrvanipāte iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:11370: (P_1,2.44.1) KA_I,215 23-216.5 Ro_II,67-68 {5/15} na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ : pūrvanipāte na iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11380: (P_1,2.44.1) KA_I,215 23-216.5 Ro_II,67-68 {13/15} atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbh_1su:11382: (P_1,2.44.1) KA_I,215 23-216.5 Ro_II,67-68 {15/15} anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti (P_1,2.44.2) KA_I,216.6-11 Ro_II,68 {1/8} ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantavacanam .
GS24pmbh_1su:11383: (P_1,2.44.2) KA_I,216.6-11 Ro_II,68 {2/8} ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantānām iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbh_1su:11384: (P_1,2.44.2) KA_I,216.6-11 Ro_II,68 {3/8} iha mā bhūt : ardham pippalyāḥ ardhapippalī iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11391: (P_1,2.44.3) KA_I,216.12-16 Ro_II,68 {1/7} kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni .
GS24pmbh_1su:11393: (P_1,2.44.3) KA_I,216.12-16 Ro_II,68 {3/7} dviguḥ : pañcabhiḥ gobhiḥ krītaḥ pañcaguḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:11394: (P_1,2.44.3) KA_I,216.12-16 Ro_II,68 {4/7} prāptāpanna : prāptaḥ jivikām prāptajīvikaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:11396: (P_1,2.44.3) KA_I,216.12-16 Ro_II,68 {6/7} alampūrva : alam kumāryai alaṅkumāriḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11402: (P_1,2.45.1) KA_I,217.2-10 Ro_II,69-71 {3/15} vanam , dhanam iti nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:11407: (P_1,2.45.1) KA_I,217.2-10 Ro_II,69-71 {7/15} kasmāt na bhavati ahan
GS24pmbh_1su:11410: jñāpayati na dhātoḥ prātipadikasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti dhātugrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11411: (P_1,2.45.1) KA_I,217.2-10 Ro_II,69-71 {9/15} na etat asti jñāpakam .
GS24pmbh_1su:11412: (P_1,2.45.1) KA_I,217.2-10 Ro_II,69-71 {10/15} pratiṣiddhārtham etat syāt : api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11417: (P_1,2.45.1) KA_I,217.2-10 Ro_II,69-71 {14/15} kasmāt na bhavati kāṇḍe
GS24pmbh_1su:11420: niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : kr̥ttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11422: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {2/66} arthavati prātipadikasañjñāyām anekasya api padasya prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbh_1su:11423: daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam ajājinam palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ sphaiyakr̥tasya pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11425: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {4/66} samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavārthavattvāt samudāyārthavattvam yathā loke .
GS24pmbh_1su:11426: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {5/66} samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ samudāyāḥ api arthavantaḥ bhavanti yathā
GS24pmbh_1su:11429: āḍhyam idam nagaram , gomat idam nagaram iti ucyate na ca tatra sarve
GS24pmbh_1su:11432: ucyate loke ca avayavāḥ eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11433: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {8/66} ātaḥ ca avayavāḥ eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11434: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {9/66} yasya hi tat dravyam bhavati saḥ tena kāryam karoti yasya ca gāvaḥ santi saḥ tāsām kṣīram
GS24pmbh_1su:11439: vācoyuktiḥ : āḍhyam idam nagaram , gomat idam iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11441: : iha tāvat āḍhyam idam nagaram iti akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ : āḍhyāḥ asmin santi iti tat idam āḍhyam iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11444: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {14/66} evam api vākyapratiṣedhaḥ arthavattvāt
GS24pmbh_1su:11445: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {15/66} vākyasya prātipadikasñjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām .
GS24pmbh_1su:11446: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {16/66} devadatta gām abhyāja kr̥ṣṇām iti
GS24pmbh_1su:11453: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {21/66} padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11454: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {22/66} padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet evam ucyate : padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ bhavati vākye .
GS24pmbh_1su:11456: ukte kartā nirdiṣṭaḥ karma kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau .
GS24pmbh_1su:11457: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {24/66} gām iti ukte karma nirdiṣṭam kartā kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau .
GS24pmbh_1su:11459: kriyā nirdiṣṭā kartr̥karmaṇī guṇaḥ ca anirdiṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11461: guṇaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ kartr̥karmaṇī kriyā ca anirdiṣṭā .
GS24pmbh_1su:11462: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {27/66} iha idānīm devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām iti ukte sarvam nirdiṣṭam bhavati :
GS24pmbh_1su:11464: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {28/66} gauḥ eva karma na anyat .
GS24pmbh_1su:11469: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {31/66} eteṣām padānām sāmānye vartamānānām yadviśeṣe avasthānam saḥ vākyārthaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11474: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {36/66} arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : samāsaḥ eva arthavatām
GS24pmbh_1su:11475: samudāyāyānām prātipadikasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11476: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {37/66} yadi niyamaḥ kriyate prakr̥tipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbh_1su:11480: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {39/66} prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:11483: aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na bhavati evam luk api na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:11485: antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ eva śravaṇam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:11488: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {45/66} bahupaṭavaḥ iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:11489: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {46/66} paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ : citaḥ saprakr̥teḥ bahvakajartham iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11490: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {47/66} tasyām punaḥ luptāyam yā anyā vibhaktiḥ utpadyate tasyāḥ prakr̥tyanekadeśatvāt
GS24pmbh_1su:11492: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {48/66} evam tarhi ācāryapravr̥ttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati prakr̥tipratyayasamudāyasya
GS24pmbh_1su:11493: prātipadikasañjñā iti yat ayam aprayayaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11495: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {50/66} saḥ tarhi jñāpakārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11500: kr̥ttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati na anyasya pratyayāntasya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11501: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {54/66} saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ prakr̥tipratyayasamudāyasya vā prātipadikasañjñā vaktavyā .
GS24pmbh_1su:11508: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {61/66} suptiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11509: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {62/66} suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate : jahi karmaṇā bahulam ābhīkṣṇye kartāram ca
GS24pmbh_1su:11511: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {63/66} tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : etasya eva suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na
GS24pmbh_1su:11513: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {64/66} tiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11514: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {65/66} tiṅsamudāyasya api prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate : ākhyātam ākhyātena kriyāsātatye iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11515: (P_1,2.45.2) KA_I,217.11-219.9 Ro_II,71-77 {66/66} tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : etasya eva tiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na
GS24pmbh_1su:11517: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {1/40} arthavattā na upapadyate kevalena avacanāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:11518: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {2/40} arthavattā na upapadyate vr̥kṣaśabdasya
GS24pmbh_1su:11521: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {5/40} na kevalena vr̥kṣaśabdena arthaḥ gamyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:11529: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {12/40} nityasambandhau etau arthau prakr̥tiḥ pratyayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11530: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {13/40} pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya aprayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:11531: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {14/40} anyat bhavān pr̥ṣṭaḥ anyat ācaṣṭe
GS24pmbh_1su:11534: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {16/40} arthavattā na upapadyate kevalena avacanāt iti bhavān asmābhiḥ coditaḥ kevalasya aprayoge hetum āha .
GS24pmbh_1su:11536: kr̥tvā codyate : samudāyasya arthe prayogāt avayavānām aprasiddhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11543: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {23/40} iha vr̥kṣaḥ iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate : vr̥kṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ sakārāntaḥ ca
GS24pmbh_1su:11545: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {24/40} arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate : mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān ekatvam ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:11546: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {25/40} vr̥kṣau iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : sakāraḥ hīyate ,
GS24pmbh_1su:11548: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {26/40} arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : ekatvam hīyate dvitvam upajāyate mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān anvayī .
GS24pmbh_1su:11549: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {27/40} te manyāmahe : yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:11550: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {28/40} yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:11552: tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ anvayī. viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11555: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {31/40} tat yathā : indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ , kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11558: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {33/40} tat yathā : akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:11561: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {35/40} na brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:11563: ayam prakr̥tyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakr̥tiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt pratyayaḥ eva vā .
GS24pmbh_1su:11564: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {37/40} sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11566: antareṇa viśeṣam prakaraṇam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante .
GS24pmbh_1su:11568: vr̥kṣaḥ iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cid arthe pratītiḥ upajāyate ataḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:11570: (P_1,2.45.3) KA_I,219.10-220.8 Ro_II,77-79 {40/40} na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakr̥tiḥ prakr̥tyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe .
GS24pmbh_1su:11571: (P_1,2.45.4) KA_I,220.9-24 Ro_II,79-80 {1/23} kim punaḥ ime varṇāḥ arthavantaḥ āhosvit anarthakāḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:11574: (P_1,2.45.4) KA_I,220.9-24 Ro_II,79-80 {4/23} arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām ekavarṇānām arthadarśanāt .

GS24pmbh_1su:11579: (P_1,2.45.4) KA_I,220.9-24 Ro_II,79-80 {9/23} anarthakāḥ tu prativarṇam arthānupalabdheḥ

GS24pmbh_1su:12459: (P_1,2.64.5) KA_I,239.12-240.11 Ro_II,136-139 {25/40} ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbh_1su:12468: cit anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakr̥taḥ bhāvaḥ .

GS24pmbh_1su:12475: api apāye na bhavati catvāraḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12476: (P_1,2.64.5) KA_I,239.12-240.11 Ro_II,136-139 {36/40} anyat idānīm etat ucyate sakr̥t ete śabdāḥ pravr̥ttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:12480: (P_1,2.64.5) KA_I,239.12-240.11 Ro_II,136-139 {38/40} tatra etat bhavān āha sakr̥t ete śabdāḥ pravr̥ttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:12483: ekaikaḥ kartā syāt sarve vā syuḥ katham yuktam || kāraṇam udyamanam cet na udyacchati ca antareṇa tat tulyam |
GS24pmbh_1su:12484: tasmāt pr̥thak pr̥thak te kartāraḥ savyapekṣāḥ tu ||
GS24pmbh_1su:12486: (P_1,2.64.6) KA_I,240.12-15 Ro_II,140 {2/4} prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : pacati ca pacasi ca pacathaḥ , pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāvaḥ , pacati ca pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāmaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:12487: (P_1,2.64.6) KA_I,240.12-15 Ro_II,140 {3/4} kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:12494: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {5/61} tena anena tadarthena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbh_1su:12508: svābhāvikī vā anekārthatā syāt vācanikī vā .
GS24pmbh_1su:12510: svābhāvikī aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ ekena uktatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:12512: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {19/61} ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12514: vaktavyam : ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate saḥ ca dvyarthaḥ bhavati bahvarthaḥ ca
GS24pmbh_1su:12517: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {22/61} siddham ekaśeṣaḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:12519: ayam aviśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā śakyā labdhum .
GS24pmbh_1su:12522: tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:12524: antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati iti agnicit somasut iti yathā .
GS24pmbh_1su:12526: lopakr̥tam etat yena atra antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya
GS24pmbh_1su:12529: ekaśeṣakr̥tam etat yena atra ekaḥ ayam avaśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā
GS24pmbh_1su:12533: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {30/61} yaḥ hi gām aśvaḥ iti brūyāt aśvam vā gauḥ iti na jātu cit sampratyayaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:12534: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {31/61} tena anekārthābhidhāne yatnam kurvatā avaśyam lokaḥ pr̥ṣṭhataḥ anugantavyaḥ :
GS24pmbh_1su:12535: keṣu artheṣu laukikāḥ kān śabdān prayuñjate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12537: vr̥kṣaḥ iti prayuñjate dvayoḥ vr̥kṣau iti bahuṣu vr̥kṣāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12539: avaśyam śabdeṣu pramāṇam kimartham ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:12540: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {34/61} atha kimartham lopaḥ ārabhyate
GS24pmbh_1su:12541: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {35/61} pratyayalakṣaṇam ācāryaḥ prārthayamānaḥ lopam ārabhate .
GS24pmbh_1su:12542: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {36/61} ekaśeṣārambhe punaḥ asya na kim cit prayojanam asti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12544: pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya abhidhānam iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12546: śabdena anekasya arthasya abhidhānam syāt na pratyartham śabdaniveśaḥ kr̥taḥ syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:12547: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {39/61} pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasya abhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet tat api pratyartham eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:12548: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {40/61} pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasyābhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet evam ucyate :
GS24pmbh_1su:12549: yat api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati tat api pratyartham eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:12550: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {41/61} yat api hi arthau arthau prati tat api pratyartham eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:12551: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {42/61} yat api hi arthān arthān prati tat api pratyartham eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:12552: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {43/61} yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:12553: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {44/61} yāvatām arthānām abhidhānam bhavati tāvatām śabdānām prayogaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nyāyyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:12554: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {45/61} yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti cet ekena api anekasya abhidhānam .
GS24pmbh_1su:12555: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {46/61} yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti cet evam ucyate : eṣaḥ api nyāyyaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:12556: eva yat api ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:12558: anekasya abhidhānam bhavati plakṣanyagrodhau : ekena uktatvāt aparasya
GS24pmbh_1su:12560: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {48/61} ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:12563: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {51/61} ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa nyagrodhārthaḥ iti kr̥tvā nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:12564: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {52/61} katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12565: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {53/61} sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati na virūpāṇām .
GS24pmbh_1su:12567: sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati na punaḥ virūpāṇām .
GS24pmbh_1su:12572: dr̥śyate : virūpāṇām api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:12576: (P_1,2.64.7) KA_I,240.16-242.9 Ro_II,140-144 {61/61} virūpāṇām kila nāma ekena anekasya abhidhānam syāt kim punaḥ sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbh_1su:12580: vā ekam śabdam vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate : ekā
GS24pmbh_1su:12582: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {3/54} katham punaḥ jñāyate ekā ākr̥tiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12584: na hi gauḥ iti ukte viśeṣaḥ prakhyāyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12586: prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ekā ākr̥tiḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat sā abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12588: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {7/54} avyapavargagateḥ ca manyāmahe ākr̥tiḥ abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12589: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {8/54} na hi gauḥ iti ukte vyapavargaḥ gamyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12590: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {9/54} jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam . jñāyate khalu api ekopadiṣṭam .
GS24pmbh_1su:12594: deśe anyasmin kāle anyasyām ca vayovasthāyām dr̥ṣṭvā jānāti ayam gauḥ iti
GS24pmbh_1su:12597: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {13/54} tasya eva upodbalakam etat : prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12598: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {14/54} dharmaśāstram ca tathā . evam ca kr̥tvā dharmaśāstram pravr̥ttam : brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:12600: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {16/54} brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram ca na pīyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:12601: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {17/54} yadi dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam brāhmaṇam ahatvā ekām ca surām apītvā anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:12604: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {19/54} tasya eva upodbalakam etat : avyapavargagateḥ ca dharmaśāstram ca tathā iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12616: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {27/54} evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ . tat yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam ākr̥tiḥ api yugapat sarvatra bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:12618: evam vijñeyam ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate iti. na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat iti cet tathā ekaśeṣe .
GS24pmbh_1su:12619: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {29/54} yaḥ hi manyate na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapad upalabhyate iti ekaśeṣe tasya doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbh_1su:12621: ekaḥ vr̥kṣaśabdaḥ anekam artham yugapat abhidadhīta .
GS24pmbh_1su:12625: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {33/54} dravyābhidhāne sati ākr̥teḥ asampratyayaḥ syāt .

GS24pmbh_1su:12631: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {39/54} aśāstrokte ca kriyamāṇe viguṇam karma bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:12635: ākr̥tiḥ padārthaḥ tasya api yadi anavayavena codyate na ca anubadhyate

GS24pmbh_1su:12648: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {50/54} codanāyām ca ekasya upādhivr̥tteḥ manyāmahe ākr̥tiḥ abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12649: (P_1,2.64.8) KA_I,242.10-244.7 Ro_II,144-150 {51/54} āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet : ekam nirupya dvitīyas tr̥tīyaḥ ca nirupyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:12651: padārthaḥ syāt ekam nirupya dvitīyasya tr̥tīyasya ca nirvapaṇam na
GS24pmbh_1su:12657: (P_1,2.64.9) KA_I,244.8-245.5 Ro_II,150-152 {1/21} dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ . dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate : dravyam abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12660: liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti : brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇaḥ , brāhmaṇau brāhmaṇāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12665: (P_1,2.64.9) KA_I,244.8-245.5 Ro_II,150-152 {6/21} gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti : ākr̥tau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni kriyante .
GS24pmbh_1su:12668: (P_1,2.64.9) KA_I,244.8-245.5 Ro_II,150-152 {8/21} na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate .

GS24pmbh_1su:12686: (P_1,2.64.9) KA_I,244.8-245.5 Ro_II,150-152 {21/21} ākr̥tau api padārthe ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : akṣāḥ , pādāḥ , māṣāḥ iti .

GS24pmbh_1su:12704: (P_1,2.64.10) KA_I,245.6-247.16 Ro_II,153-159 {13/95} evam tarhi liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt .

GS24pmbh_1su:12717: (P_1,2.64.10) KA_I,245.6-247.16 Ro_II,153-159 {22/95} liṅgaparihāraḥ ca api na upapadyate
GS24pmbh_1su:12719: (P_1,2.64.10) KA_I,245.6-247.16 Ro_II,153-159 {24/95} āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya pravartate utpattiprabhr̥ti ā vināśāt tat liṅgam na jahāti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12720: (P_1,2.64.10) KA_I,245.6-247.16 Ro_II,153-159 {25/95} tasmāt na vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum .
GS24pmbh_1su:12726: (P_1,2.64.10) KA_I,245.6-247.16 Ro_II,153-159 {30/95} kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau iti
