GS24pmbh_1su:12960: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {8/31} idam tarhi prayojanam : parasya śeṣam vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12964: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {12/31} pūrvasya khalu api śeṣaḥ dr̥śyate : saḥ ca yaḥ ca tau ānaya , yau ānaya iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12965: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {13/31} idam tarhi prayojanam :dvandvaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12966: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {14/31} etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbh_1su:12968: sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:12969: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {16/31} yadi sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti ucyate śūdrābhīram ,
GS24pmbh_1su:12972: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {18/31} iha tāvat śūdrābhīram iti : ābhīrāḥ jātyantarāṇi .
GS24pmbh_1su:12973: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {19/31} gobalīvardam iti : gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:12979: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {24/31} sāmānyena uktatvāt viśeṣasya prayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:12980: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {25/31} sāmānyena uktatvāt tasya arthasya viśeṣasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:12984: idam bhavati : tam brāhmaṇam ānaya gārgyam iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12985: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {29/31} bhavati yadā niyogataḥ tasya eva ānayanam bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:12987: eva khalu api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati tam brāhmaṇam ānaya gārgyam iti tena eva hetunā vr̥ttiḥ api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12988: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 {31/31} tasmāt sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:12989: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {1/19} ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbh_1su:12990: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {2/19} katham gāvaḥ imāḥ caranti ,
GS24pmbh_1su:12992: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {3/19} gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:12996: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {6/19} iha mā bhūt : nyaṅkavaḥ ime , śūkarāḥ ime iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:12997: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {7/19} kaḥ punaḥ arhati agrāmyāṇām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye grahītum aśakyāḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:12998: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {8/19} kutaḥ eva vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:13001: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {10/19} iha mā bhūt : brāhmaṇāḥ ime , vr̥ṣalāḥ ime
GS24pmbh_1su:13002: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {11/19} kaḥ punaḥ arhati apaśūnām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:13005: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {13/19} iha mā bhūt : etau gāvaḥ carataḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13006: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {14/19} kaḥ punaḥ arhati nirjñāte arthe anyathā prayoktum
GS24pmbh_1su:13009: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {16/19} iha mā bhūt : uraṇakāḥ ime , barkarāḥ ime iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13010: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 {17/19} kaḥ punaḥ arhati taruṇānām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:13015: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {2/55} yadi tāvat saṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kriyate bhvādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13016: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {3/55} atha asaṃhitayā bhū-ādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbh_1su:13017: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {4/55} ataḥ uttaram paṭhati : bhūvādīnām vakāraḥ ayam maṅgalārthaḥ prayujyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13018: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {5/55} māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham vakāram āgamam prayuṅkte .
GS24pmbh_1su:13019: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {6/55} maṅgalādīni maṅgalamadhyāni maṅgalāntāni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣāṇi ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:13020: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {7/55} adhyetāraḥ ca siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13022: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {9/55} yadi tāvat paṭhyante na arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena
GS24pmbh_1su:13032: sati yat ādigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti ca pāṭhaḥ bāhyaḥ ca sūtrāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13035: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {17/55} pāṭhena dhātusañjñā iti etat upapannam bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13037: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {19/55} pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13038: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {20/55} yā iti dhātuḥ yā iti ābantaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13039: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {21/55} vā iti dhātuḥ vā iti nipātaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13040: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {22/55} nu iti dhātuḥ nu iti pratyayaḥ ca nipātaḥ ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:13041: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {23/55} div iti dhātuḥ div iti prātipadikam
GS24pmbh_1su:13042: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {24/55} kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api dhātusañjñā syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:13043: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {25/55} dhātoḥ iti tavyādīnām utpattiḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:13045: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {27/55} sādhane tavyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13047: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {29/55} sādhanābhāvāt satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13048: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {30/55} iha tarhi : yāḥ paśya : ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:13052: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {33/55} asya tarhi vāśabdasya nipātasya adhātuḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:13054: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {34/55} aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:13056: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {36/55} nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13057: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {37/55} tatra anarthakagrahaṇam na kariṣyate : nipātaḥ prātipadikam iti eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:13058: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {38/55} iha tarhi : trasnū iti : aci śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iti uvaṅādeśaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:13061: jñāpayati na pratyayasya uvaṅādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tatra śnugrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13062: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {41/55} asya tarhi divśabdasya adhātuḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:13063: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {42/55} aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:13066: jñāpayati utpadyante divśabdāt svādayaḥ iti yat ayam divaḥ sau auttvam śāsti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13072: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {48/55} divśabdaḥ yat prātipadikam tadartham etat syāt : akṣadyūḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13074: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {50/55} aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13075: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {51/55} evam tarhi ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13076: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {52/55} evam api ananubandhakaḥ divśabdaḥ na asti iti kr̥tvā sānubandhakasya grahaṇam vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13079: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 {55/55} iyān avadhiḥ dhātusañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam kutaḥ hi etat bhūśabdaḥ dhātusañjñaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:13080: bhaviṣyati na punaḥ bhvedhśabdaḥ iti (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {1/84} yadi punaḥ kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:13087: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {8/84} sarvathā bhavān śabdena eva śabdān ācaṣṭe .
GS24pmbh_1su:13092: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {11/84} aśakyā kriyā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13095: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {14/84} iha sarveṣu sādhaneṣu sannihiteṣu kadā cit pacati iti etat bhavati kadācit na bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13096: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {15/84} yasmin sādhane sannihite pacati iti etat bhavati sā nūnam kriyā .
GS24pmbh_1su:13098: devadattaḥ iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati sā nūnam kriyā .
GS24pmbh_1su:13099: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {17/84} katham punaḥ jñāyate kriyāvacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13108: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {25/84} kriyāvacane dhātau upasargapratyayayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13113: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {29/84} saṅghātena hi arthaḥ gamyate saprakr̥tikena sapratyayakena sopasargeṇa ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:13117: karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā astyādīnām nidarśyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13118: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {33/84} na hi bhavati kim karoti asti iti
GS24pmbh_1su:13120: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {35/84} pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakr̥tyantareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13124: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {38/84} dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu
GS24pmbh_1su:13125: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {39/84} dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13126: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {40/84} paktā pacanam pākaḥ iti : pratyayārthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13128: saḥ eva. katham punaḥ jñāyate ayam prakr̥tyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13134: ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate : pacśabdaḥ cakārāntaḥ atiśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13136: cit gamyate : viklittiḥ kartr̥tvam ekatvam ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:13138: kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : pacśabdaḥ hīyate paṭhśabdaḥ upajāyate atiśabdaḥ anvayī .
GS24pmbh_1su:13140: cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : viklittiḥ hīyate paṭhikriyā
GS24pmbh_1su:13141: upajāyate kartr̥tvam ca ekatvam ca anvayī .
GS24pmbh_1su:13143: yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13144: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {50/84} yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13146: tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ anvayī .
GS24pmbh_1su:13151: indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ , kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13154: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {56/84} tat yathā : akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti
GS24pmbh_1su:13158: arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva .
GS24pmbh_1su:13160: : ayam prakr̥tyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakr̥tiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt pratyayaḥ eva vā .
GS24pmbh_1su:13161: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {60/84} sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13162: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {61/84} sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa prakaraṇam viśeṣam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante .
GS24pmbh_1su:13164: niyogataḥ pacati iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cit viśeṣe pacatiśabdaḥ vartate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13165: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {63/84} na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakr̥tiḥ prakr̥tyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe .
GS24pmbh_1su:13171: atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra dhātuḥ upasargam vyabhicarati yatra na khalu tam vyabhicarati tatra katham : adhyeti , adhīte iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13173: dhātuḥ upasargam na vyabhicarati upasargaḥ tu dhātum vyabhicarati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13175: yaḥ eva asya adheḥ anyatra arthaḥ sa iha api iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13181: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {73/84} tiṣṭhati iti vrajikriyāyāḥ nivr̥ttiḥ pratiṣṭhate iti vrajikriyā gamyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13182: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {74/84} te manyāmahe upasargakr̥tam etat yena atra vrajikriyā gamyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13183: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {75/84} praḥ ayam dr̥ṣṭāpacāraḥ ādikarmaṇi vartate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13184: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {76/84} na ca idam na asti bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13185: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {77/84} tat yathā : vapiḥ prakiraṇe ḍr̥ṣṭaḥ chedane api vartate : keśaśmaśru vapati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13186: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {78/84} īḍiḥ stuticodanāyācñāsu dr̥ṣṭaḥ preraṇe api vartate : agniḥ vai itaḥ vr̥ṣṭim
GS24pmbh_1su:13188: (P_1,3.1.2) KA_I,254.13-256.17 Ro_II,179-185 {79/84} karotiḥ abhūtaprādurbhāve dr̥ṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe api vartate : pr̥ṣṭham kuru pācau , kuru .
GS24pmbh_1su:13191: vartate : kaṭe kuru , ghaṭe kuru , aśmānam itaḥ kuru .
GS24pmbh_1su:13194: tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyām āha tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyāyāḥ nivr̥ttim .
GS24pmbh_1su:13197: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {1/70} yadi punaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti evam lakṣaṇam kriyeta .
GS24pmbh_1su:13198: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {2/70} katham punaḥ jñāyate bhāvavacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13200: sāmānādhikaraṇyam : bhavati pacati , bhavati pakṣyati , bhavati apākṣīt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13202: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {5/70} bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13203: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {6/70} yadi bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbh_1su:13209: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {9/70} yaḥ hi yasya bhāvam icchati saḥ na tasya abhāvam yasya ca abhāvam na tasya bhāvam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13210: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {10/70} pacādīnām ca dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:13212: kriyāvacane dhātau karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā bhāvavacane dhātau nidarśyate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13213: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {12/70} karotiḥ pacācīnām sarvān kālān sarvān puruṣān sarvāṇi ca vacanāni anuvartate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13214: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {13/70} bhavatiḥ punaḥ vartamānakālam ca eva ekatvam ca .
GS24pmbh_1su:13216: vācoyuktiḥ : bhavati pacati , bhavati pakṣyati , bhavati apākṣīt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13218: : pacādayaḥ kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13220: atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā yatra khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham : bhavet api bhavet , syāt api syāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13225: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {20/70} ekasya atra bhavateḥ bhavatiḥ sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13226: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {21/70} aparasya bāhyam sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13228: anyatvam asti pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartr̥sādhanaḥ : bhavati iti bhāvaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13230: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {24/70} vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13231: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {25/70} bhavet vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā syāt prātipadikānām api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbh_1su:13236: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {28/70} evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati : bhāvyate yaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13237: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {29/70} kriyā ca eva hi bhāvyate svabhāvasiddham tu dravyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13239: keṣām cit na syāt yāni na bhāvyante .
GS24pmbh_1su:13241: sambandhiśabdāḥ teṣām prāpnoti : mātā pitā bhrātā iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13242: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {32/70} sarvathā vayam prātipadikaparyudāsāt na mucyāmahe .
GS24pmbh_1su:13243: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {33/70} paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ : bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivr̥ttyarthaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13244: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {34/70} yāvatā paṭhiṣyati pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam
GS24pmbh_1su:13249: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {38/70} etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13252: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {41/70} vadeḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ iñ kartr̥sādhanaḥ : bhuvam vadanti iti bhūvādayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13254: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {43/70} bhāvavacane dhātau tadarthasya pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : śiśye iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13260: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {47/70} itaretarāśrayam ca pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13263: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {50/70} pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13264: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {51/70} utpanne hi pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam gamyate saḥ ca tāvat bhāvavacanāt utpannaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13265: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {52/70} tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati
GS24pmbh_1su:13266: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {53/70} itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante
GS24pmbh_1su:13267: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {54/70} siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13275: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {61/70} prathamam yaḥ bhāvam āha iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13277: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {63/70} kim śabdataḥ āhosvit arthataḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13279: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {65/70} yadi śabdataḥ sanādīnām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : putrīyati vastrīyati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13280: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {66/70} atha arthataḥ siddhā sanādīnām dhātusañjñā saḥ eva tu doṣaḥ bhavati : bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13281: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {67/70} evam tarhi na eva arthataḥ na eva śabdataḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13284: (P_1,3.1.3) KA_I,256.18-258.6 Ro_II,185-192 {70/70} sumadhyame abhidhāne yaḥ prathamam bhāvam āha.
GS24pmbh_1su:13285: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {1/26} iha ye eva bhāvavacane dhātau doṣāḥ te eva kriyāvacane api .
GS24pmbh_1su:13286: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {2/26} tatra te eva parihārāḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:13290: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {5/26} kām punaḥ kriyām bhavān matvā āha astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13291: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {6/26} kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13304: ha sma āha bhagavān vārṣyāyaṇiḥ : jāyate asti vipariṇamate vardhate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti
GS24pmbh_1su:13310: kriyā nivartikā bhavati dravyam dravyasya nivartakam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13311: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {17/26} evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pr̥cchati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13312: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {18/26} kimavasthaḥ devadattasya vyādhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13316: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {21/26} aparaḥ āha : sthitaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13318: vardhateḥ ca apakṣīyateḥ ca nivr̥ttiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13319: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {23/26} atha vā na antareṇa kriyām bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante .
GS24pmbh_1su:13322: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {25/26} atha vā na anyat prṣṭena anyat ākhyeyam
GS24pmbh_1su:13323: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 {26/26} tena na bhaviṣyati kim karoti asti iti
GS24pmbh_1su:13325: kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ atha api bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13328: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {4/34} ayam ādiśabdaḥ asti eva vyavasthāyām vartate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13330: devadattādīn samupaviṣṭān āha : devadattādayaḥ ānīyantām iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13336: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {10/34} pratyekam ca ādiśabdaḥ parisamāpyate
GS24pmbh_1su:13340: kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ vyavasthāyām vartate vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre .
GS24pmbh_1su:13341: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {13/34} bhū iti evamādayaḥ vā iti evamprakārāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13342: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {14/34} yadā tu bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:13343: vyavasthāyām bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre .
GS24pmbh_1su:13346: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {16/34} yadi tarhi lakṣaṇam kriyate na idānīm pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13356: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {25/34} āṇapayati vaṭṭati vaḍḍhati iti
GS24pmbh_1su:13358: {27/34} svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ : svarān anubandhān ca jñāsyāmi iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13360: pātham svarāḥ anubandhāḥ vā śakyāḥ vijñātum .
GS24pmbh_1su:13362: nyāyyavikaraṇāḥ udāttāḥ ananubandhakāḥ paṭhyante eteṣām pāṭhaḥ śakyaḥ akartum .
GS24pmbh_1su:13363: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {30/34} eteṣām api avaśyam āṇapayatyādinivr̥ttyarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13365: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {32/34} śiṣṭaprayogāt āṇapayatyādīnām nivr̥ttiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13367: śiṣṭaprayogaḥ upāsyaḥ ye api paṭhyante teṣām api viparyāsanivr̥ttyarthaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13368: (P_1,3.1.5) KA_I,258.22-259.14 Ro_II,196-198 {34/34} loke hi kr̥ṣyarthe kasim prayuñjate dr̥śyarthe ca diśim .
GS24pmbh_1su:13371: uddeśe yaḥ anunāsikaḥ tasya mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13372: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 {3/11} kaḥ punaḥ uddeśopadeśayoḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13373: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 {4/11} pratyakṣam ākhyānam upadeśaḥ , guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13374: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 {5/11} pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:13375: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 {6/11} tat yathā : agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakhthani karṇe vā gr̥hītvā upadiśati : ayam gauḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13376: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 {7/11} saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha : upadiṣṭaḥ me gauḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13378: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 {9/11} tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : devadattam me bhavān uddiśatu iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13379: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 {10/11} saḥ ihasthaḥ pāṭaliputrastham devadattam uddiśati : aṅgadī kuṇḍalī kirīṭī vyūḍhoraskaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:13380: vr̥ttabāhuḥ lohitākṣaḥ tuṅganāsaḥ citrābharaṇaḥ īdr̥śaḥ devadattaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13381: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 {11/11} saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha : uddiṣṭaḥ me devadattaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13384: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {3/63} sarvasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:13389: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {7/63} na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ : upādīyate evañjātīyakasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā bhavati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13391: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {9/63} kim ucyate anupādīyamāne viśeṣe iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13396: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {13/63} pratyakṣam ākhyānam uddeśaḥ guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13397: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {14/63} pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam uddeśaḥ
GS24pmbh_1su:13398: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {15/63} tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : anuvākam me bhavān uddiśatu iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13402: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {18/63} saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha : uddiṣṭaḥ me anuvākaḥ .
GS24pmbh_1su:13406: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {21/63} tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : grāmantaram gamiṣyāmi .
GS24pmbh_1su:13407: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {22/63} panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti
GS24pmbh_1su:13409: : amuṣmin avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ , amuṣmin hastavāmaḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13410: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {24/63} saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha : upadiṣṭaḥ me panthāḥ iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13411: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {25/63} evam etau saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau
GS24pmbh_1su:13412: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {26/63} evam tarhi itkāryābhāvāt itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13413: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {27/63} nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:13417: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {30/63} kāryārthaḥ vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā .
GS24pmbh_1su:13420: yadi śravaṇam api na syāt upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbh_1su:13422: : abhre ām̐ aṭitaḥ : anantaralakṣaṇāyām itsañjñāyām satyām āditaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbh_1su:13424: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {34/63} siddham tu upadeśane anunāsikavacanāt
GS24pmbh_1su:13426: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {36/63} upadeśane yaḥ anunāsikaḥ saḥ itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13443: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {50/63} tatra api sañjñāyām iti vartate
GS24pmbh_1su:13445: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {52/63} prāyavacanāt asañjñāyām api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbh_1su:13446: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {53/63} prāyavacanāt sañjñāyām eva syāt vā na vā .
GS24pmbh_1su:13450: upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam kalyāṇyādīnām inaṅ kulaṭāyāḥ vā inaṅ vibhāṣā na prāpnoti
GS24pmbh_1su:13453: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {57/63} vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakr̥taḥ ca anuvartate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13455: vākinādīnām kuk ca putrāt anyatarasyām iti kuk vibhāṣā na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13456: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {59/63} atra api kuk eva pradhānam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13457: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {60/63} vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakr̥taḥ ca anuvartate .
GS24pmbh_1su:13459: akr̥tam bhavati na upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13462: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 {63/63} evam tarhi kr̥tyalyuṭaḥ bahulam iti evam atra ghañ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13469: (P_1,3.3.1) KA_I,261.5-15 Ro_II,202-203 {6/26} sarvaḥ hi hal tam tam avadhim prati antyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbh_1su:13474: (P_1,3.3.1) KA_I,261.5-15 Ro_II,202-203 {11/26} vyavasitāntyaḥ hal itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbh_1su:13480: (P_1,3.3.1) KA_I,261.5-15 Ro_II,202-203 {17/26} nanu ca uktam halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ sarvāntyatvāt iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13482: (P_1,3.3.1) KA_I,261.5-15 Ro_II,202-203 {19/26} āha ayam hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbh_1su:13483: (P_1,3.3.1) KA_I,261.5-15 Ro_II,202-203 {20/26} sarvaḥ ca hal tam tam avadhim prati antyaḥ bhavati .

GS24pmbh_1su:18227: (P_1,4.109) KA_I,354.17-356.13 Ro_II,478-484 {1/53} paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ samhitā cet adrutāyām asaṃhitam . paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā cet adrutāyām vr̥ttau saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti .
